page.title: 06CARTERTON TRADE AND COMMERCE
page.content: The residents of{Carterton}do not think that the{shopping}facilities are adequate for a town of its present size. Most products are available but there are very few outlets, therefore the choice is more limited than in Witney,a town of comparable size. {Carterton Chamber of Trade}assisted in the first{Carterton Trade Fair}held in May 1985. In the future it will be held every other year. A committee also organize an annual{Gala}in Carterton,which is the town's main summer social event. Both events are to promote the town's commercial potential. In recent years, Carterton has attracted a fairly comprehensive range of{professional services}. There are now solicitors,several banks, estate agents,building societies and an optician. The only things you can't buy in Carterton are jewels!
